font_size.$description: Font size that scales with typography multiplier

line_height.$description: Line height that scales with typography multiplier

letter_spacing.$description: Letter spacing for pill text labels

font_family.$description: Font family for pill text labels - consistent across all sizes

font_weight.$description: Font weight for pill text labels - consistent across all sizes

text_decoration.$description: No text decoration for pill labels

text_transform.$description: No text transformation for pill labels

text_align.$description: [NO-FIGMA-SUPPORT] Center alignment for pill text labels - set manually in Figma components.

text_vertical_trim.$description: [NO-FIGMA-SUPPORT] Vertical trim from cap height to baseline for optimal pill text alignment. Set manually in Figma components using 'Vertical trim' property. CSS implementation: use 'text-box-trim: cap alphabetic' or equivalent.
